Name: Thumbs Up
Summary: Gave meaningful comment(s) during class time

Name: Deep Thinker
Summary: Prompted deep thought and/or discussion during class time

Name: Mighty Mentor
Summary: Gave me valued advice on academic, ministry, or personal matters

Name: Super Proofer
Summary: Proofread my paper for technical errors

Name: Study Buddy
Summary: Helped me study for an exam or prep for presentation

Name: Cool Critique
Summary: Critiqued my assignment, giving helpful and timely feedback on overall work

Name: Lunch Time Theologian
Summary: Talked with me about theological or ministry matters over lunch

Name: Coffee Cup Theologian
Summary: Talked with me about theological or ministry matters over coffee

Name: Prayer Partner
Summary: Prayed with me one-on-one or in a small group
